title: BOARDWALK / RAILING
description: You've discovered Idiot Doom Spiral's missing jacket.

dialogueTree.title: Railing: "Someone has left an unidentifiable..."
dialogueTree.text: Someone has left an unidentifiable article of clothing on this railing. It smells really bad.

links.title: You: "Touch it."
links.text: Touch it.

links.title: Railing: "The cloth, if you can still call it..."
links.text: The cloth, if you can still call it that, makes a soft crunching sound as you thrust your finger into it.

links.title: You: "Take a closer look."
links.text: Take a closer look.

links.title: Railing: "It's streaked with dried seagull sh..."
links.text: It's streaked with dried seagull shit and tangled with pieces of seaweed. A dangling arm suggests that there might be a jacket beneath the crust of filth.

links.title: Logic: "It seems likely that it was left in..."
links.text: It seems likely that it was left in the surf until someone laid it out on this fence to dry out. Unfortunately that just seems to have stiffened it into a shapeless mass.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Please tell me you're not taking t..."
links.text: "Please tell me you're not taking that with you."

links.title: You: ""I think this is the jacket the Idi..."
links.text: "I think this is the jacket the Idiot Doom Spiral Guy wanted me to find."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant looks at the stinkin..."
links.text: The lieutenant looks at the stinking rag and sniffs. "I'm sure he'll be *thrilled* to have it returned."

links.title: You: ""Why not?""
links.text: "Why not?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's a guano-encrusted jacket. And..."
links.text: "It's a guano-encrusted jacket. And you're already carrying around enough as it is."

links.title: You: ""It might be a clue.""
links.text: "It might be a clue."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A clue? You think our suspect is a..."
links.text: "A clue? You think our suspect is a seagull who's been defecating on unsuspecting jackets?"

links.title: You: ""No.""
links.text: "No."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Me neither.""
links.text: "Me neither."

links.title: Interfacing: "You should still take it. It's prob..."
links.text: You should still take it. It's probably Doom Spiral's.

links.title: Interfacing: "You should still take it."
links.text: You should still take it.

links.title: You: ""Yes.""
links.text: "Yes."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant sighs."
links.text: The lieutenant sighs.

links.title: Conceptualization: "A poet could write a dozen verses a..."
links.text: A poet could write a dozen verses and still not begin to capture the profound vexation in that sigh.

links.title: You: ""It could have been multiple seagul..."
links.text: "It could have been multiple seagulls."

links.title: Interfacing: "Much as the thought of touching it..."
links.text: Much as the thought of touching it causes you to cringe, this could be the jacket that the idiot in the colourful tracksuit was looking for...

links.title: Inland Empire: "This jacket reeks of loss and failu..."
links.text: This jacket reeks of loss and failure. It could be the one that the idiot in the colourful tracksuit was looking for...

links.title: You: "Maybe later. [Leave.]"
links.text: Maybe later. [Leave.]
